events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the Software Engineer position and will review the submitted resume and cover letter shortly.
The candidate’s application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software and developer found in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to the candidate’s case to proceed with the next steps of the recruitment process.
The candidate successfully passed the initial screening call where their software development skills and project experiences were discussed in detail.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the interview scheduling request, expressing eagerness to proceed with the technical interview phase.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for the candidate and all logistics have been confirmed via email.
